name: AiAi
description:
A story about robots and humans falling in love, simple as that.

Ai is short for artificial intelligence in English, and in Chinese it is the pinyin for "love". With this in mind, I gave him this title

It took me about two weeks to learn the software and make it just to tell a story. It's pretty minimal, but I hope you enjoy it. If there are any misunderstandings in the language due to my oversight, please let me know.

⚠ I regret that English is not my native language, so I had some difficulties with the translation. This game contains an English translated version, but I guess it is rather stiff. The default is Chinese, if you want to change it, please follow the page below to change the English.
